import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../../hooks/useAuth';import{validateOTP}from'../../utils/helpers';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OTPVerification=()=>{const[otp,setOtp]=useState('');const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState('');const[registrationData,setRegistrationData]=useState(null);const{register}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{// Get registration data from session storage
const storedData=sessionStorage.getItem('registrationData');if(storedData){setRegistrationData(JSON.parse(storedData));}else{// No registration data, redirect to register
navigate('/register');}},[navigate]);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');if(!validateOTP(otp)){setError('Please enter a valid 6-digit OTP');return;}if(!registrationData){setError('Registration data not found. Please try again.');return;}setIsLoading(true);const result=await register(registrationData.email,registrationData.name,otp);if(result.success){// Clear registration data
sessionStorage.removeItem('registrationData');navigate('/chat');}else{setError(result.error);}setIsLoading(false);};const handleOtpChange=e=>{const value=e.target.value.replace(/\D/g,'').slice(0,6);setOtp(value);};if(!registrationData){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"auth-title",children:"Verify Your Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"auth-subtitle",children:["We've sent a 6-digit code to ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:registrationData.email})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"auth-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"otp",children:"OTP Code"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"otp",type:"text",value:otp,onChange:handleOtpChange,placeholder:"Enter 6-digit OTP",maxLength:"6",required:true,disabled:isLoading,className:"otp-input"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error-message",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",disabled:isLoading||otp.length!==6,children:isLoading?'Verifying...':'Verify OTP'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"auth-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"link-button",onClick:()=>navigate('/register'),children:"Back to Register"})})]})});};export default OTPVerification;
